Synergy folds two of her three claws in; her equivalent of a finger-
waggling gesture.  "I'll warn you, the only combat experience I've 
had lately is as a bouncer for a rowdy bar in the fringe territories."

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> Dreadplague: Then you'd want to see the Major. He's our leader.
> Otherwise, you'd join the losing teams. You might not want that. And
> I'm sure you'd like a part in our crushing of them.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> 
wrote:
> > Synergy::
> > 
> > The Guardian makes no apologies for her behavior, but she appears 
to 
> > be considering Darkangel's offer.  "Maybe.  I'd like to meet the 
head 
> > nutcase of this clown act before I decide one way or the other."
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> 
wrote:
> > > : : Darkangel : :
> > > Darkangel: We apologize for asking so many questions. But it is 
> > surprising to see a Guardian Robot functioning in this day and 
age. 
> > Are you looking to join faction?
> > > 
> > > 
> > > cardhead649 <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> > > "What is this, anyway?"  Synergy takes a menacing step 
> > forward.  "I'm 
> > > not in the mood to play Twenty Questions!"

<cardhead649@y...> 
> > > wrote:
> > > > > Synergy glares down at the technorganic-2 
femme.  "'Letting' 
> > had 
> > > > > nothing to do with it," she growls.  "I left, plain and 
> > simple.  
> > > The 
> > > > > Autobots were too busy cracking heads with the Decepticons 
to 
> > go 
> > > > > looking for me at the time, and afterwards they forgot 
about 
> > me."
> > > > >

wrote:

> > > > > > >

any 
> > of

> > > > > > > beeswax."

Synergy."

arm 
> > > over. 
> > > > > > > Despite the rough landing, Synergy doesn't seem all 
that 
> > > hurt, as 
> > > > > she 
> > > > > > > test-fires the napalm cannon built into the center of 
her 
> > > claw - 
> > > > > > > reducing a nearby shrub to a scorch mark on the 
> > > ground. "Hmmm. 
> > > > > > > Well, at least I didn't burn the darn thing out."
> > > > > > >

> > > > > harm,
> > > > > > > > you would not even worry. Let's keep this friendly, 
then.

humanoid 
> > > form.

> > > > > > > > > newcomer is a midget - for a Guardian Robot.  16 
feet 
> > > tall, 
> > > > > and 
> > > > > > > > > clearly heavily armed and armored, this is one 
> > dangerous 
> > > > > femme.  
> > > > > > > And 
> > > > > > > > > she's in a foul mood.  "Who are you?"
> > > > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > > > Lacking any insignia, the only clue to alignment is 
her 
> > > > > > > structural 
> > > > > > > > > resemblance to the legendary Omega Supreme.  Her 
color 
> > > > > pattern is 
> > > > > > > > > much different: mostly black, with deep blue trim.
